desc: Cocoa Cheeks is Unapologetic. We are the World's first & only cloth diaper brand dedicated to honoring the Genius of Color. Cocoa Cheeks was created to represent, educate, inspire, & reawaken your Genius. Your heritage is rich. Our Genius is Legendary. Journey with us as we encourage our next generations. Ciao Bella

layout.text: Welcome to Cocoa Cheeks. We are the World's first cloth diaper brand dedicated to honoring the Genius of Color.
